mapper.select: select gno, gfile, gtitle, gtext, ghit, glike from gallery order by 1 desc
select gno, gwriter, gfile, gtitle, gtext, gdate, ghit, glike from gallery where gno=#{gno}
mapper.update: update gallery set gfile=#{gfile}, gwriter=#{gwriter}, gtitle=#{gtitle}, gtext=#{gtext} where gno=#{gno}
update gallery set glike=glike+1 where gno=#{gno}
